name: Storage Madness
description:
You play as an SD card trying to destroy apps that are filling up your storage. Collect coins to buy upgrades and items, such as BitCleaner and Electro Bomb, and remember: don’t run out of space!

Also, this is our first game!

-HOW TO PLAY-

Don’t let apps fill up your storage and try to survive for as many days as possible! Collect coins to buy items and upgrades from the shop.

-CONTROLS-

[WASD] - move

[mouse] - shoot electro-bullets

[Q] Electro Grenade - deals 4 damage to nearby apps (consumable)

[E] BitCleaner - cleans half of your storage (consumable)
